Class com.heaton.bot.Link 

Object
   |
   +----com.heaton.bot.Link
public class Link
extends Object
Very simple data class to hold HTML links. This class holds both the actual link URL, as well as the ALT tag. Copyright 2001 by Jeff Heaton

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton

_alt
The ALT attribute.
_href
The link attribute.
_prompt
The link prompt text

Link 
public Link(String alt,
            String href,
            String prompt)
The constructor.

Parameters:
alt - The alt attribute for this link.
href - The URL this link goes to.
prompt - The prompt(if any) for this link.
